A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Definitely a must watch. Those who are not deep star wars fans will love it. Those that are will have slightly different opinions This is my opinion of the movie. At first I loved it. Like as soon as it was done I was in love. Then I got in my car and I started thinking back on things that happened\, and the hype went down a little. Then I looked at Reddit and started remembering and reflecting on the movie more. Then I hated it. But I found this one post (https://www.reddit.com/r/StarWars/comments/7klj1h/spoilers_rian_johnsons_many_levels_of_tlj_and_the/) that appealed to the theme and direction of the movie. It explained what Johnson was doing and my outlook on this movie boosted back up to positive. I am going to see it for a second time on the 27 so we shall see if my opinion changes once again. Overall I think it is a must watch. Amazing movie.
